snippet: Legislation intended to help protect infrastructure from terrorists is hampered by fears of pressure from advocates who scored a victory against antipiracy bills. Meanwhile, the media and Internet giants who are at odds over dealing with purloined...
abstract: Legislation intended to help protect infrastructure from terrorists is hampered by fears of pressure from advocates who scored a victory against antipiracy bills. Meanwhile, the media and Internet giants who are at odds over dealing with purloined content on the Web may need to agree first on the extent of the problem.

headline.main: Daily Report: Reverberations of the Antipiracy Bills
